body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good day! My name is Andrew Cooper, and I represent LightFrame Photography Studio. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It’s a pleasure to meet you, Jane. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit disappointed about the pricing on my recent photo shoot. It seems there has been a mistake.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm really sorry to hear that, Jane. To better assist you, could you provide me with your booking reference number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's B F one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jane. And for security purposes, can you also confirm your email address associated with this booking?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, I have located your booking. I see where the pricing issue stems from. I'll work on resolving this for you right away.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you so much, Andrew. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, it's my pleasure to assist. We value your business and want to ensure you're completely satisfied. Is there anything else I can help with today?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Jane! Thank you for your time and have a wonderful day. Goodbye!
